refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_SESSION_get_protocol_version() returns the protocol version number used by session s.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: SSL_SESSION_get_protocol_version() returns a number indicating the protocol version used for the session; this number matches the constants e.g. TLS1_VERSION or TLS1_2_VERSION.
Note that the SSL_SESSION_get_protocol_version() function does not perform a null check on the provided session s pointer.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: SSL_SESSION_get_protocol_version() was first added to OpenSSL 1.1.0
